posts.post_content:
Posted By: Bryon
I have a 1951 Bowman #134 Warren Spahn PSA 8 available for trade...I'm very open to considering any and all trade ideas for this, but I'd most like to trade it for a graded, pre-war HOF'er card. 

Please email with any offers... elemenopeo@gmail.com

A bit more explanation... In 2007, just for the fun of it, I began a project to try to trade my way from a dime-a-dozen card to a 1952 Topps Mickey Mantle. I started with a raw 1986 Topps common and have since made my way to the Spahn. If interested, you can read more about my project here...

[url]http://www.tradingcarddb.com/52MantleProject.cfm[/url]


[IMG]http://i162.photobucket.com/albums/t275/Elemenopeo/Trading%20up%20to%20Mantle/File5415.jpg[/IMG] [IMG]http://i162.photobucket.com/albums/t275/Elemenopeo/Trading%20up%20to%20Mantle/File5416.jpg[/IMG]

Posted By: Bryon

Bump for bump's sake.
